commands.name: addClass
commands.desc: Adds a new uniquely named class

commands.name: removeClass
commands.desc: Removes the class with name and its contents

commands.name: addRelationship
commands.desc: Creates a relationship between the source and destination classes

commands.name: removeRelationship
commands.desc: Removes a relationship between the source and destination classes

commands.name: addAttribute
commands.desc: Adds an attribute to a class

commands.name: removeAttribute
commands.desc: Removes an attribute from a class

commands.name: renameAttribute
commands.desc: Updates an attributes name from old to new in class

commands.name: save
commands.desc: Saves the current state to a json file with name filename

commands.name: load
commands.desc: Loads the current state stored in filename

commands.name: listClasses
commands.desc: Displays a list of all classes and their contents

commands.name: listClass
commands.desc: Displays a list of the specified classes contents

commands.name: listRelationships
commands.desc: Lists all relationships that exist between classes

commands.name: help
commands.desc: A list of commands and how to use them
